item.title: MONGIL: STAR DIVE ‘Ready, Set, ACTION!’ trailer – Netmarble action RPG for PC, iOS, and Android
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/mongil-star-dive-ready-set-action-trailer-netmarble-action-rpg-for-pc-ios-and-android

  • PC
  • Smartphone

Playable at G-Star 2024.

Publisher Netmarble and developer Netmarble Monster have released the first official trailer for MONGIL: STAR DIVE, its upcoming action RPG sequel to the “rekindled first love RPG” Monster Taming. It is planned for a global release across PC, iOS, and Android in the second half of 2025.

Built in Unreal Engine 5, MONGIL: STAR DIVE follows protagonists Verna and Cloud. Players can utilize special companion Yaongi’s abilities to collect and train monsters, build three-member teams, and engage in strategic, tag-based combat.

A story demo of MONGIL: STAR DIVE will be playable at G-Star 2024 from November 14 to 17 at Busan Exhibition and Convention Center in Busan, South Korea. Users who stop by the Netmarble booth and play the game will have the chance to win various prizes.

Watch the trailer below. Visit the official website here.

item.title: Skate City: New York announced for Apple Arcade
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/skate-city-new-york-announced-for-apple-arcade

  • Smartphone

Skate City sequel due out on January 9, 2025.

Publisher Snowman and developer Agens have announced Skate City sequel Skate City: New York for Apple Arcade. It will launch on January 9, 2025.

Here is an overview of the game, via Apple Arcade:

About

Your perfect ride, New York sized.

Jump into the ultimate skateboarding experience with Skate City: New York, the latest addition to the Skate City series. Navigate the iconic streets of New York City as you master hundreds of tricks in famous, real-world skate spots. Jump over taxis, dodge pedestrians and string together impressive combos to land your highest scores!

Key Features

  • A New Bag Of Tricks – Now everyone can skate like a pro! The entire trick list is back from Skate City with even more abilities, including wall rides, boardslides, lipslides, tap grinds, late tricks, and more.
  • I Love New York
    • Explore the evolving streets of New York City as you move between boroughs, subway tunnels and pristine waterfronts to find new skate spots. Each run is a fresh experience, thanks to our procedural generation, which crafts new paths through the city as you explore. Every corner, rail and rooftop offers a unique challenge and an opportunity for epic tricks!
    • Want to hit your favorite spots or master that gnarly staircase gap? Check out Free Skate and Challenge Mode for bite-sized sessions in dedicated locations.
  • Practice Makes Perfect – Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned skater, our comprehensive and interactive trick guide will help you nail every trick in the book and get creative with electrifying combos.
  • Challenge or Chill
    • Work your way through each level in Challenge Mode to learn new abilities and earn Skate Cred as you conquer everything the Big Apple throws at you.
    • Test yourself against the best in Pro Skate Mode. Set high scores, compete in the leaderboards or just aim for new personal bests as you complete goals, escape security guards and drop in on skate contests.
    • When things get too busy, take it at your own pace in Free Skate Mode. Explore the city at your leisure, session your favorite skate spots and record skate clips with a host of camera tools as you make the city your own.
  • Level Up – Find your style with a gigantic collection of unlockable gear in the skate shop. Customize everything from decks and trucks to hairstyles, skin tone and streetwear to personalize your skater’s appearance.
  • Feel The Vibe – Master your flow and push for perfection with an all-new, original soundtrack of Skate City‘s patented, certified beats. Plug in your headphones for the ultimate mellow mood.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

item.title: Aloft launches in Early Access on January 15, 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/aloft-launches-in-early-access-on-january-15-2025

  • PC

Cooperative sandbox survival game from Funcom and Astrolabe Interactive.

Aloft, a cooperative sandbox survival game set in a world of floating islands, will launch in Early Access for PC via Steam on January 15, 2025, publisher Funcom and developer Astrolabe Interactive announced.

Get the latest details below.

Having already garnered praise from players across several demos, Aloft‘s solid foundation is a huge and wind-shaped world in which you can transform any floating island you want into your personal skyship, outfitting it with sails, rudder, helm, and everything it needs to harness the winds.

Enjoy the zen of building and crafting, the satisfaction of cleansing the corruption from islands’ ecosystems, and the thrill of exploring serene and stormy skies, all while uncovering the mysterious past that has rendered the world as it is. As you travel, collect seeds to plant, animals to nurture, and ancient technology to progress.

Brave the elements alone or band together in groups of up to eight players, each of you capable of bringing your own skyship with you when joining another player’s world. Cluster together and you can light up the night sky with an entire airborne village.

Throughout Early Access, Aloft will expand with brand new game mechanics, biomes to explore, challenges to overcome, items to craft, and much more.

Watch a new trailer below. View two new screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: 3D platformer Misc. A Tiny Tale for Switch, PC launches in 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/3d-platformer-misc-a-tiny-tale-for-switch-pc-launches-in-2025

  • PC
  • Switch

A tale of two tiny robots.

Misc. A Tiny Tale, a 3D platformer about two tiny robots, will launch for Switch and PC via Steam in 2025, developer Tinyware Games announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Tinyware Games:

About

Join Buddy and Bag Boy, two tiny robots crafted from miscellaneous parts, on a heartfelt adventure. In this charming collectathon, explore a familiar world from a unique perspective, hopping over everyday objects and solving puzzles.

As you explore, collect trash, coins, cogs, and more to help others around you—whether its finding lost treasures or uniting secret lovers, each quest makes the world a better place, one act of kindness at a time.

Misc. A Tiny Tale blends captivating storytelling, intricate puzzles, and a touch of nostalgia to create an unforgettable adventure. Embrace the joy of making a difference in this wholesome journey!

  • ❮
  • ❯

Key Features

  • Classic Platformer Fun – Enjoy nostalgic platforming gameplay from a unique, tiny perspective.
  • Collectibles Around Every Corner – Find items such as trash, coins, golden cogs, lost treasures, and more.
  • Colorful Characters – Discover the stories of each robot you encounter, helping them with unique puzzles and quests.
  • Clean Up the World – Make the world a better place by recycling trash and scrubbing up goop.
  • A Heartfelt Tale – Experience a touching narrative that celebrates differences, following Buddy and Bag Boy on their journey.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View a set of screenshots at the gallery.
